mapper.update: update p_shelf set capacity=capacity-1, stock=stock+1 where id=#{id}
update p_shelf set capacity=capacity+1, stock=stock-1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select station,sum(capacity) capacity,sum(stock) stock from p_shelf group by station
